top_categories.workout_context: Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience's ontario rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience's Ontario rolling, Local event forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 55 miles.
At Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience. Train it until it feels boring.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before April.
55 miles on ontario rolling gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
Varied gradients on ontario rolling gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.
When someone attacks on ontario rolling gravel, you have 10 seconds to respond or you're off the back. This builds that response.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Base fitness for Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience. Without this, the hard workouts break you down instead of building you up.
Torque for headwinds and ontario rolling gravel. When cadence drops below 70rpm, muscular strength keeps the watts up.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience’s 55 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Ottawa Valley Gravel Experience requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on ontario rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: ontario rolling, local event, canadian gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Over Under to prepare you for 55 miles of ontario rolling gravel in Calabogie, Ontario, Canada.
